original_text: So Ruth went to the fields. She began to pick up the grains of barley that the men dropped on the ground. It happened that she was in part of a field that belonged to Boaz. Boaz was from Elimelech's clan.
korean_text: 룻이 가서 베는 자를 따라 밭에서 이삭을 줍는데 우연히 엘리멜렉의 친족 보아스에게 속한 밭에 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: So Ruth went to the fields.
She began to pick up the grains of barley
that the men dropped on the ground.
It happened that she was in part of a field
